questions.title: Who are venture capitalists?
options: A person or organization that puts money into financial schemes, property, etc. with the expectation of achieving a profit
A person or firm that provides new businesses with management assistance and investment capital to get things running smoothly
A person, company, or institution that owns at least one share of a company's stock, known as equity

questions.title: In what ways do venture capitalists get involved with a company?
options: A person or firm that provides new businesses with management assistance and investment capital to get things running smoothly
By using their investment to buy stakes and positions within new companies

questions.title: What kind of position does the venture capitalist take?
options: A person or firm that provides new businesses with management assistance and investment capital to get things running smoothly
By using their investment to buy stakes and positions within new companies
They are viewed as a partner

questions.title: In what ways does a venture capitalist benefit the business?
options: A venture capitalist brings much needed funds into the company without any regular repayment required
By using their investment to buy stakes and positions within new companies
They are viewed as a partner

questions.title: What do venture capitalists find attractive?
options: A venture capitalist brings much needed funds into the company without any regular repayment required
They place just as much weight on the strength of a companyâ€™s team of managers as they do on the product or service they sell when determining where to invest their funds
They are viewed as a partner
